admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia

abstracts.cdata!:
The project would support the further
            expansion of Turkey's transmission grid to accommodate
            increased load and generation capacity. It would support the
            construction of about 800 km of 380-kV transmission lines
            and transformer substations at the 380-kV and 154-kV voltage
            levels with a total installed capacity of about 5400 MVA.
            The project would also include a tower testing facility,
            line stringing equipment, consulting services and training.
